actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend chapter 19 of title 20 US Code, to require that members of the uniformed services are covered by serviceman's group life insurance during a period they are assigned to duty in a combat zone.

summary.text: Requires the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to insure members of the uniformed services with servicemen's group life insurance during any period they are assigned to duty in a combat zone in the amount of $15,000, subject to election by the member to be insured for only $10,000. (Adds 38 U.S.C. 767(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend chapter 19 of title 20 US Code, to require that members of the uniformed services are covered by serviceman's group life insurance during a period they are assigned to duty in a combat zone.
